Posts.Content:
hello ,
 can u please tell me how long should one wait before getting a Biopsy done . i was told that i have 2 lumps in my right breast.on the 30 - May-2012 . Need to get one done but the date that i got is for 31 - July- as my Mother die form breast cancer i know it is not some thing to put of. can u tell if that date is OK or it needs to be done as soon as
Thanks
Stephanie
Posts.Title: Having Biopsy done
